metadata.title: CVE-2024-29881 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: TinyMCE is an open source rich text editor. A cross-site scripting (XSS)vulnerability was discovered in TinyMCEâ€™s content loading and contentinserting code. A SVG image could be loaded though an `object` or `embed`element and that image could potentially contain a XSS payload. Thisvulnerability is fixed in 6.8.1 and 7.0.0.

criterions.comment: tinymce package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
